DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this study is to investigate potential differences in treatment adherence by teenagers among four interventions during treatment for acne.
DOC.brief_title: Analysis of Adherence & Associated Factors in Teenagers Undergoing Treatment of Acne Vulgaris With DifferinÂ® Gel 0.1%
DOC.criteria: Adolescent subjects with a diagnosis of moderate to severe Acne vulgaris Subjects with acne conglobata, acne fulminans, secondary acne (chloracne, druginduced acne, etc.), or severe acne requiring more than topical treatment (e.g. oral isotretinoin)
